titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Office of International Students and Scholars Records
Office of International Students and Scholars Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 11:58

did.unittitle: Office of International Students and Scholars records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of personnel records, student records, and other materials documenting international students, employees and faculty at Yale University.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Office of International Students and Scholars

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 4-E (YRG 4-E), Records documenting international students and scholars at Yale University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted to the office of origin only.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Office of International Students and Scholars, Yale University, Records (RU 162). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Office of International Students and Scholars (OISS) is responsible for the general welfare of international students, employees and faculty at Yale University. OISS serves as a resource on immigration matters for the Yale community and Yale's liaison to those federal agencies concerned with matters related to international students and scholars.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of personnel records, student records, and other materials documenting international students, employees and faculty at Yale University.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.
